subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Isiah Thomas, the Knicks’ coach, was ejected with 2 minutes 15 seconds left Saturday night, and the Knicks fell to the Boston Celtics at Madison Square Garden.
snippet: Isiah Thomas, the Knicks’ coach, was ejected with 2 minutes 15 seconds left Saturday night, and the Knicks fell to the Boston Celtics at Madison Square Garden.
